post.description: Get videos listing along with channel details Quota cost is 2 unit.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Example value: UCMhe8jmac-tWKU0Vj_OXDvA

parameters.name: forUsername
parameters.description: If id not available then provide username. Quota cost +1.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Sorts the channel videos. Available options: newest [default] oldest popular

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Pagination token

parameters.name: geo
parameters.description: ISO 3166-2 country code of the region. Like US (default), GB, CA, IN, etc.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code for localized results. Like en, gb, hi, etc

parameters.name: local
parameters.description: Get localized data, the value must be 1. Works with provided value of geo, if not provided then default is US. Quota Cost +1

get.description: Get channel video listing and channel details. Quota cost is 1 unit.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Channel Id

parameters.name: forUsername
parameters.description: If id not available then provide username. Quota cost +1.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Sorts the channel videos. Available options: newest [default] popular oldest

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Pagination token Alternatively, use X-TOKEN in header

parameters.name: geo
parameters.description: ISO 3166-2 country code of the region. Like US (default), GB, CA, IN, etc.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Locale/language for request. Like en, gb, hi, etc

parameters.name: local
parameters.description: Get localized data, the value must be 1. Works with provided value of geo, if not provided then default is US. Quota Cost +1

parameters.name: X-CACHEBYPASS
parameters.description: Cache bypass, the value must be 1 Quota Cost +1

parameters.name: X-TOKEN
parameters.description: Alternative way to pass Pagination token via headers. This will solve 414, URI too long issue.

get.description: Update viewCount, likeCount. Useful for Live videos. Quota Cost +1

parameters.name: id

get.description: Get all the details of the YouTube video. Quota cost is 1 unit.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Youtube video id or multiple ids separated by , For mutli id batch request, quota cost is +1 for each extra id. Note: Mutli id batch request is experimental.

parameters.name: extend
parameters.description: Extend the results to include more details like related videos/playlist, comment count, etc. Available options: 1 = for likeCount, commentCount, subscriberCountText, relatedVideos, channelBadges, chapters, merchandise,extraMeta,videoAttribution (not supported for multi ids) 2 = for likeCount, commentCount, channelHandle Quota cost is +1

parameters.name: geo
parameters.description: ISO 3166-2 country code of the region. Like US (default), GB, CA, IN, etc.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code for localized results. Like en, gb, hi, etc

parameters.name: X-CACHEBYPASS
parameters.description: Cache bypass, the value must be 1 Quota Cost +1

get.description: Convert, translate, download the subtitle.  To get the subtitle url, use `Video -\u003e Subtitles` endpoint or `Video -\u003e Details` endpoint Quota cost is 1 unit.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Provide the Subtitle url. Available in the Video -> Subtitles or Video -> Details endpoint response.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Subtitle format options: json3 [mime: json] srv1 [mime: xml] [default] srv2 [mime: xml] srv3 [mime: xml] ttml [mime: xml] vtt [mime: text] srt [mime: text]

parameters.name: targetLang
parameters.description: Translate to Language. Valid codes are in the translationLanguages param of the Video -> Subtitles or Video -> Info endpoint response. Or provide ISO-639 code of the language like es, zh-Hans, co, hi, etc

parameters.name: X-CACHEBYPASS
parameters.description: Cache bypass, the value must be 1 Quota Cost +1

get.description: Get the list of available subtitles for the video. Quota cost is 1 unit.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Example value: arj7oStGLkU

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Subtitle format options: json3 [mime: json] srv1 [mime: xml] [default] srv2 [mime: xml] srv3 [mime: xml] ttml [mime: xml] vtt [mime: text] srt [mime: text]

parameters.name: X-CACHEBYPASS
parameters.description: Example value:

get.description: Stream or download info. Quota cost is 1 units.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Youtube Video Id or Shorts Id.

parameters.name: cgeo
parameters.description: Country code in ISO 3166 format of the end user. Not providing cgeo param may cost +1 quota. It is important to provide geo of the end user to get the best speed and direct links. If links are used in the server, then cgeo will be the geo of the server. Not providing cgeo param may lead to 403 issue

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code for audio results based on availability. Like en, ru, hi, etc

get.description: Get trending videos region-wise \u0026 niche-wise. Quota cost is 1 unit.

parameters.name: geo

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Trending type: now music games movies Default is now

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Locale/language for request. Like en, gb, hi, etc

parameters.name: X-CACHEBYPASS
parameters.description: Cache bypass, the value must be 1 Quota Cost +1

get.description: Search videos, playlists, channels, or all of them. Quota cost is 2 units.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search term

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Pagination token Alternatively, use X-TOKEN in header

parameters.name: geo
parameters.description: ISO 3166-2 country code of the region. Like US (default), GB, CA, IN, etc.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Locale/language for request. Like en, gb, hi, etc

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Search type filter options: video channel playlist movie show shorts Sorting is not available in shorts

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Duration filter options: short - less than 4 min medium - 4 to 20 min long - more than 20 min

parameters.name: features
parameters.description: Video Features options: HD subtitles CCommons 3D Live Purchased 4K 360 Location HDR VR180 Multiple features could be joined by ',' For example: HD,subtitles

parameters.name: upload_date
parameters.description: Upload Date filter options: hour today week month year

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Results Sort options: relevance [default] rating date views

parameters.name: local
parameters.description: Get localized data, the value must be 1. Works with provided value of geo, if not provided then default is US. Quota Cost +1

parameters.name: X-CACHEBYPASS
parameters.description: Cache bypass, the value must be 1 Quota Cost +1

parameters.name: X-TOKEN
parameters.description: Alternative way to pass Pagination token via headers. This will solve 414, URI too long issue.
